title: 100 Women History Hour
description: A special edition of the programme remembering some of the women that history has overlooked. From women warriors to women scientists. From rural women, to factory workers we bring you the stories of women who made a contribution to history - and who deserve to be remembered.
itunes:subtitle: A special edition of the programme remembering women that history has overlooked.
